name: HKStatisticsCollectionQueryDescriptor
desc: A query descriptor that gathers a collection of statistics calculated over a series of fixed-length time intervals.

items.name: typealias HKStatisticsCollectionQueryDescriptor.Output
items.desc: The type of data that the statistics collection query returns.

items.name: typealias HKStatisticsCollectionQueryDescriptor.Sequence
items.desc: The asynchronous sequence that the statistics collection query returns.

items.name: init(predicate: HKSamplePredicate<HKQuantitySample>, options: HKStatisticsOptions, anchorDate: Date, intervalComponents: DateComponents)
items.desc: Creates a statistics collection query descriptor.

items.name: func result(for: HKHealthStore) -> HKStatisticsCollection
items.desc: Runs a one-shot query and asynchronously returns statistics calculated from the current matching results.

items.name: func results(for: HKHealthStore) -> HKStatisticsCollectionQueryDescriptor.Results
items.desc: Initiates a long-running query that returns statistics and updates using an asynchronous sequence.

items.name: struct HKStatisticsCollectionQueryDescriptor.Results
items.desc: An asynchronous sequence that emits updates from a statistics collection query.

items.name: var predicate: HKSamplePredicate<HKQuantitySample>
items.desc: A predicate that defines the set of data that the query uses to calculate the statistics.

items.name: var options: HKStatisticsOptions
items.desc: A list of options that define the type of statistical calculations performed and the way in which HealthKit merges data from multiple sources.

items.name: var anchorDate: Date

items.name: var intervalComponents: DateComponents
items.desc: The date components that define the time interval for each statistics object in the collection.
